Legal Mentions

Under Article 6 of French Law No. 2004-575 of 21 June 2004 to give confidence in the digital economy, the identity of the various stakeholders as part of its implementation and monitoring is clear to users of the Site https://www.netatmo.com
Owner: NETATMO, company simplified actions capital of 4.616.841 euros, whose head office is located 73 Rue de Sèvres, 92100 Boulogne Billancourt - FRANCE, registered with the Nanterre Trade and Companies Register under number 532 501 848, VAT number within the Community : FR 43 532 501 848. Contact Number: +33 1 70 83 27 72
Publication director: Emmanuelle Levine
Host: Microsoft Azure’s cloud, Netherlands.https://azure.microsoft.com/fr-fr/overview/sales-number/

Terms of Use Amended on 02 May 2018 - Updated on 27 July 2020, to improve the understanding of our users

NETATMO (SAS) and its affiliates, if any, (collectively referred to as 'NETATMO', 'we', 'us' or 'our') manufacture, market and sell NETATMO consumer electronic products (the 'Product').

We also provide additional features such as (a) the website located at www.netatmo.com and more generally all URL and websites administered by NETATMO or within the netatmo.com domain (the 'Site'), (b) services available on the Site and/or delivered through the Site (the 'Site Services'), (c) certain software that may be downloaded to your computer (the 'Computer Software'), and (d) certain software that may be downloaded to your mobile device (the 'Mobile Software'). As used herein, the term 'Software' means the Computer Software and Mobile Software. the term 'Site' means the Site, Site Services, Computer Software and Mobile Software. The terms 'you' or 'user' or 'yours' refer to all individuals and entities that access and/or use the Services. The term 'Services' means the Product, the Mobile, Internet Applications as well as the Web Site. These Terms of Use ('ToU') govern your access to and use of the Services.

    SCOPE AND ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS OF USE
    1. These Terms of Use and the applicable Privacy Policy are available at https://www.netatmo.com (the 'Privacy Policy'), which is hereby fully incorporated and constitutes with the Terms of Use, one and single document, govern your access and use of the Services. Please READ THEM CAREFULLY.
    2. By your affirmative actions of registering on the Site, of accessing and/or using all or part of the Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the provisions of these Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with all or part of these Terms of Use or Privacy Policy, do not register, access, browse or use all or part of the Services.
    3. We may change these Terms of Use in case of new Services made available, regulation evolution, following legal authority request, or amendment to improve understanding. You can access on the Site the most recent version of these Terms of Use. Any user of our products will be informed of its evolutions to be able to use our Services in full understanding and will have the possibility to accept them or refuse them.
    4. If you do not agree anymore to these Terms of Use, you have the possibility to discontinue the use of our Services and cancel your registration.
    USE OF THE SERVICES
    1. The Services are for use by users who are at least 18 years old. Users under the age of 18 are not permitted to use the Services without the consent of a parent or legal guardian. However, access to the Services is not confined solely to adults as it contains no content prohibited for persons under the age of 18. The Services does not intentionally collect or use personal information relating to persons under the age of 18. By registering, accessing or using the Services, you acknowledge that the information provided, including your age or the consent of a parent or legal guardian, is accurate and complete.
    2. The Services contain all types of information and material, including but not limited to software, text, graphics, communications, measures, tests, results, opinions, photographs, drawings, profiles, messages, notes, websites links, music, video files or other animated or non-animated images, designs, music, audio files or other sounds, reports, charts and data files, and any other content, either owned by or licensed to NETATMO by any third party, including other users of the Services, to the exclusion of your User Generated Content as defined hereinafter (collectively referred to as the 'Content').
    3. The Services and Content are protected by French intellectual property laws and any other laws or regulations that may apply. You acknowledge and agree that NETATMO (or its licensors) own all legal rights, title and interest in and to the Services and Content, including any intellectual property rights which cover the Services and Content (whether those rights happen to be registered or not, and wherever in the world those rights may exist). You further acknowledge that the Services may contain information which is designated confidential by NETATMO and that you shall not disclose such information without NETATMO's prior written consent.
    4. NETATMO concedes in you a personal, worldwide, royalty-free, non-assignable, non-transferable and non-exclusive license to use the Content provided to you as part of the Services. This license is for the sole purpose of enabling you to use and enjoy the benefit of the Product(s) you registered on the Site and, as long as you have the right to be registered, to access or to use the Services, in the manner permitted by these Terms of Use. You shall not, nor shall you permit anyone else to, copy, reproduce, modify, translate, broadcast, perform, display, distribute, transmit, frame, republish, download, display, perform, post, transmit, sell, use commercially, create a derivative work, reverse engineer, decompile or otherwise attempt to extract any code from the Services and Content unless NETATMO has expressly agreed to it in writing. You agree not to use any data mining, robots, scraping or similar data gathering methods.
    5. No other use is permitted without NETATMO's prior written consent. You must retain all copyright and other proprietary notices contained in the original Content on any copy you make of the Content.
    6. The trademarks, logos, domain names and other identifying elements of NETATMO (the 'NETATMO Trademarks') used and displayed on those Services are owned by or legally held by NETATMO. Other products and service names available through the Services may be owned by third-parties (the 'Third-Party Trademarks', and, collectively with NETATMO Trademarks, the 'Trademarks'). Apart from the licenses and rights hereby expressly granted as part of these Terms of Use, nothing in the Services, Content or in these Terms of Use should be construed as granting, by implication, estoppel, or otherwise, any license or right to use any of the Trademarks displayed on the Services, without the prior written consent of NETATMO. The Trademarks may not be used to disparage or harm in any manner NETATMO or the applicable third-party, NETATMO's or third-party's products or services, or in any manner. Use of any Trademarks as part of a link to or from any web site is prohibited without NETATMO's prior written consent. All goodwill generated from the use of any NETATMO Trademarks shall inure to NETATMO's benefit.
    7. You agree not to: (a) take any action that imposes an unreasonable load on the Services' infrastructure, (b) use any device, software or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Services or any activity being conducted on the Services, (c) attempt to decipher, decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer any of the software comprising or making up the Services, (d) delete or alter any material posted on the Site by NETATMO or any other person or entity, and/or (e) frame or link to any of the materials or information available on the Services.
    8. Certain elements of the Services are protected by trade dress, trademark, unfair competition, and other laws and may not be copied or imitated in whole or in part, by any means, including but not limited to, the use of framing or mirrors, except as otherwise expressly permitted by Section 2.4 of these Terms of Use. None of the Content for the Services may be retransmitted without the express written consent from NETATMO for each and every instance.
    9. If you believe in good faith that materials on the Services provided by NETATMO infringe your copyright or author's rights, you (or your agent), may send us a notice requesting that the material be removed, or access to it blocked. Notices and counter notices with respect to the Services should be sent to NETATMO at:
      By Mail: Copyrights Agent, NETATMO, 73 Rue de Sèvres, 92100 Boulogne-Billancourt, FRANCE
      By Email: copyright@netatmo.com
    USER GENERATED CONTENT

    The following articles of this paragraph are related to the User Generated Content (the «UGC») without any requests from NETATMO and not related to the content NETATMO has access for the product and the associated services utilization, for which the articles of the Privacy Policy are applicable.

    The UGC is all types of information and material, including but not limited to your name, your biographic information, and any other names, user names, pseudonyms, software, text graphics, communications, measures, tests, results, opinions, photographs, drawing, profiles, messages, notes, website links, music, videos files or other animated or non-animated images, designs, music, audio files or other sounds, reports, charts and data files, or / and any other content, including the Feedbacks and Submissions as defined hereinafter, that you publish, display, upload, disclose, transmit, store, share or otherwise make available ('post') on or through the Services or the Site.

    1. By publishing, displaying, uploading, disclosing, transmitting, storing, sharing, 'posting' or otherwise making available your UGC on or through the Services, you hereby grant to NETATMO a perpetual, irrevocable, non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license, with the right to sublicense, to copy, reproduce, modify, translate, broadcast, perform, display distribute, transmit, frame, republish, download, display, perform, post, sell, make a commercial use and commercially exploit, create derivative works, reverse engineer, decompile, extract any code on any of your UGC, in any media now existing or hereafter developed, including without limitation on websites, in audio format, and in any print media format. You hereby waive any moral rights and similar rights with respect to the UGC and any other legal rights that might preclude NETATMO's use of the UGC or require your permission for NETATMO to use the UGC, except public order provisions. You expressly waive any action or claim, against NETATMO or its sublicensees' use of the UGC, and you hereby release NETATMO and its sublicensees from any action or claim from Third Party.
    2. You acknowledge that your UGC : (i) are not infringing any third party's rights, including copyright, patent, trademark, privacy right, trade secret, or other proprietary rights. (ii) is not obscene or containing child pornography. (iii) is not containing any viruses, worms, time bombs or other computer programming code that is intended to damage, interfere with, surreptitiously intercept or expropriate any system, data or information. (iv) is accurate, truthful, complete, not misleading and does not violate applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for complying with all laws applicable to your UGC.
    3. You declare to be aware that the content of the UGC is public and not confidential.
    4. In case of non-compliance with these conditions, We reserve the right to suspend your right to use the Services and / or the Site, temporarily or permanently, in addition to the possibility to ask for compensation for any loss or damage that could be suffered.
    ADVERTISING, LINKING AND FRAMING

    The Site and Softwares may contain information about, links to and/or advertisements for web sites operated by other parties (the 'Third Party Sites'). In addition, emails sent to users of the Services may contain information about, links to and/or advertisements for Third Party Sites. The information provided about, links to and advertisements concerning Third Party Sites are provided for your convenience only. We do not control such Third Party Sites and we are not responsible for the content and performance of these Third Party Sites and/or for any transactions you may choose to conduct with the operators of any Third Party Sites. NETATMO suggests that you carefully read the terms of use and privacy policy (if any) applicable to the Third Party Sites. You recognize and agree that NETATMO is not responsible for the content of linked Third Party Sites, sites framed within the Site or Third Party advertisements on the Site and/or in emails sent from this Site, and NETATMO does not make any representations regarding their content or accuracy. Your use of Third Party Sites is at your own risks and subject to the terms and conditions of use of such sites.

    UNSOLICITED IDEAS AND FEEDBACK
    1. NETATMO appreciates your interest in the products and the company and understands that you may have comments and suggestions. However, NETATMO does not want you to, and you should not, send any confidential or proprietary information to NETATMO through its Services, or through any other means. Please note that you have no confidentiality agreement with NETATMO and any unsolicited information or material sent to NETATMO will not be regarded by NETATMO as confidential or proprietary information. You may wish to consult with an attorney before making any unsolicited submission to NETATMO so that you can understand what will be the consequences of making an unsolicited public submission to NETATMO. If, however, you submit unsolicited information and feedback, including, without limitation, ideas for new advertising campaign, new promotions, new or improved products or technologies, product enhancements, processes, materials, marketing plans or new product names (collectively, the 'Feedback'), please be aware that regardless of what your letter and/or any other accompanying documentation may say, you are agreeing that the following terms shall apply to your Feedback: (1) NETATMO, and our designees, may use or redistribute the Feedback and/or any portions thereof for any purpose, including commercial purposes, and in any way. without compensation to you. (2) there is no obligation for NETATMO to review the Feedback and/or provide you with any commentary regarding the same. and (3) there is no obligation to keep any Feedback confidential.
    2. Upon submitting Feedback you (1) warrant that you are the original developer and/or creator of the Feedback and are legally free to make such a disclosure and you shall be solely liable for any damages arising from your submission of any information that is protected through copyright, trade secret law, patent law or other proprietary rights and (2) understand our feedback policy as set forth in this Section and accept this policy without reservation.
    SUBMISSIONS POLICY
    1. The Services may provide you with an opportunity to post publicly comments, articles and other submissions (collectively, the 'Submissions'). By posting and/or otherwise providing Submissions to the Services, you fully understand and agree to grant us with the rights described in Section 5 above. You also permit any other users to access, display, view, store and reproduce such Submissions for personal use. You acknowledge that to the extent that you include personally identifiable information in your Submissions, we may republish such information. NETATMO furthermore reserves the right to alter and edit any Submission or refuse to accept, post, display or transmit any Submission in its sole discretion.
    2. Although NETATMO has no obligation to monitor the Submissions, you acknowledge and agree that we may do one or all of the following: (i) monitor the Submissions. (ii) alter, edit, or remove any Submission in whole or in part. or (iii) disclose any Submissions. The Submissions posted on the Site by users do not indicate any approval or endorsement by NETATMO of such Submissions. NETATMO is not responsible for, and hereby disclaims any and all liabilities that may arise from the Submissions.
    3. You agree that you are responsible for your own use of the Services, for any Submission you make, and for any consequences thereof. You agree that you will use the Services in compliance with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws, rules and regulations, including any laws regarding the transmission of technical data exported from your country of residence. To provide a forum where ideas can be shared in a productive and safe environment, you agree NOT to:
      1. Post any private information, or otherwise harvest, collect or disclose information, about another person without his or her express written consent;
      2. Post any content to the Site that is unlawful, racist, hateful, libelous, defamatory, obscene, or that intentionally discriminates against or harasses particular individuals or groups;
      3. Post any content to the Site that infringes any third party's intellectual property or other rights.
      4. Use the Services for any unlawful purpose, or transmit or otherwise make available in connection with the Services any material that would give rise to criminal or civil liability;
      5. Use the Services for advertisements, chain letters, spam, survey solicitations, junk mail or solicitations;
      6. Impersonate any person or entity, including any NETATMO employees, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity;
      7. Imply that NETATMO endorses any of your statements or positions.
      8. Take any action that imposes an unreasonable load on the server.
      9. Use any device, software or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Services or any activity being conducted on the Services;
      10. Attempt to decipher, decompile, disassemble or reverse-engineer any of the software comprising or making up the Services. and/or
      11. Delete or alter any material posted by any other person or entity.
    DISCLAIMER OF CONTENT AND WARRANTIES
    1. The warranty for the product is set forth in the limited warranty available on https://www.netatmo.com .
    2. NETATMO, ITS AFFILIATES, THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, SUPPLIERS, OR LICENSORS (COLLECTIVELY, THE 'NETATMO PARTIES') MAKE NO WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS OF ANY KIND, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, ABOUT THE CONTENT AND SERVICES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THEIR OPERATION, ACCURACY, RELIABILITY, COMPLETENESS, TIMELINESS OR RELIABILITY. THE NETATMO PARTIES DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICES WILL OPERATE ERROR FREE, WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR AVAILABLE AT ANY TIME OR FROM ANY PARTICULAR LOCATION, OR THAT THE SERVICES, ITS SERVER, OR THE CONTENT, ARE FREE OF COMPUTER VIRUSES OR SIMILAR CONTAMINATION OR DESTRUCTIVE FEATURES. IF YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES OR THE CONTENT CAUSES THE NEED FOR SERVICING OR REPLACING EQUIPMENT OR DATA, NO NETATMO PARTY SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THOSE COSTS. THE SERVICES AND CONTENT ARE PROVIDED ON AN 'AS IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' BASIS WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THE NETATMO PARTIES DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE WARRANTIES OF TITLE, MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTIES RIGHTS AND FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
    3. The Content on the Services is presented in a summary fashion and is intended to be used for informational purposes only. The data, measurements as well as any other kind of content provided through the Services are supplied without any warranty of accuracy and should not be used as a source to make any decisions.
    LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
    1. IN NO EVENT SHALL ANY NETATMO PARTY BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WHATSOEVER (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, LOST PROFITS, LOST DATA OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) ARISING OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE, OR RESULTING FROM USE OF THE SERVICES AND THEIR CONTENT, WHETHER SUCH DAMAGES ARE BASED ON WARRANTY, CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY, EVEN IF ANY NETATMO PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. THE NETATMO PARTIES SHALL NOT BE SUBJECTED TO LIABILITY FOR THE TRUTH, ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF THE CONTENT AND SERVICES, OR ANY OTHER INFORMATION CONVEYED TO THE USER, OR FOR ERRORS, MISTAKES OR OMISSIONS THEREIN, OR FOR ANY DELAYS OR INTERRUPTIONS OF THE DATA, OR INFORMATION STREAM FROM WHATEVER CAUSE. YOU AGREE THAT YOU USE THE SERVICES AND THEIR CONTENT AT YOUR OWN RISKS. THE AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF THE NETATMO PARTY, TAKEN INDIVIDUALLY OR COLLECTIVELY, ARISING OUT OR RELATING TO THE SITE AND SERVICES (REGARDLESS OF THE FORM OF ACTION OR CLAIM, E.G. CONTRACT, WARRANTY, TORT, STRICT LIABILITY, NEGLIGENCE, OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY) IS LIMITED TO $100.
    2. In some countries, the applicable law does not allow certain of the above limitations or exclusions, in which case they may not apply to you. IN SUCH COUNTRIES, THE LIABILITY OF THE NETATMO PARTIES SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE GREATEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW.
    INDEMNIFICATION OF NETATMO

    Upon simple request by us, you agree to defend, indemnify, and protect NETATMO from and against any losses, liabilities, damages and costs, including without limitation, reasonable legal and accounting costs, arising or resulting from any claims, actions or demands related to (i) your use or misuse of the Services, including any UGC . (ii) your breach of these Terms of Use . or (iii) any breach of any intellectual property or other third party rights, or any applicable law in connection with the use of the Services. NETATMO shall provide a notice to you of any such claim, suit, or proceedings. NETATMO reserves the right to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter which is subject to indemnification under this section. In such case, you agree to cooperate with any reasonable requests assisting NETATMO's defense of such matter.

    TERMINATION OF THE SERVICES
    1. These Terms of Use will continue to apply until terminated by either you or NETATMO as set out below.
    2. If you want to terminate your legal agreement with NETATMO, you may do so by (a) notifying NETATMO at any time at the following address NETATMO, 73 Rue de Sèvres, 92100 Boulogne-Billancourt or by email:privacy@netatmo.com and (b) closing your accounts for the Services which you use.
    3. NETATMO may, at any time, terminate its legal agreement with you if:
      1. You have breached any provisions of these Terms of Use (or have acted in a manner which clearly shows that you do not intend to, or are unable to comply with the provisions of the Terms of Use). or
      2. NETATMO is required to do so by law (for example, where the provision of the Services to you is, or becomes, unlawful). or
      3. The relationship between NETATMO and the Partner with whom NETATMO offered the Services to you has been terminated or the Partner has decided not to offer the Services anymore. or
      4. NETATMO is transitioning to no longer providing the Services to users in the country in which you are a resident or from where you use the Services, for example in NETATMO's sole opinion, a service is no longer commercially viable.
    4. You understand and agree that some of your UGC, such as that displayed outside your profile, in any part of the Site, or on any social platforms, may continue to appear on the Site or on other social platforms even after your UGC is removed from the Site or your account is terminated.
    5. Sections 2 (Use of the Services), 7 (Disclaimer of Content and Warranties), 8 (Limitation of Liability), 9 (Indemnification of NETATMO), 10 (Termination of Terms of Use), and 13 (Miscellaneous) shall survive the termination of this Terms of Use.
    USER MUST COMPLY WITH APPLICABLE LAWS
    1. The Services are hosted in the following countries: France, Ireland, Germany, The Netherlands, The United States, Japan and for Russian users, cloud hosting servers in Russia. If you access the Content or Services from inside or outside of France, you do so at your own risk.
    2. France and other countries control the export of certain products and information. You expressly agree to comply with such restrictions and not to export or re-export any of the Content to countries or persons prohibited under the export control laws. By downloading the Content, you are expressly agreeing that you are not in a country where such export is prohibited or are a person or entity for which such export is prohibited. You shall be liable for compliance with the laws regarding the import, export, or re-export of the Content.
    CREDITS

    IPhone, iPod and iPad are registered trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the Us and other countries. HomeKit is a trademark of Apple Inc. App Store is a service mark of Apple Inc. Google, Google Play, Android, and related marks and logos are trademarks of Google Llc. Amazon, Alexa and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.

    MISCELLANEOUS
    1. These Terms of Use are governed by French law. Any dispute resulting from these Terms of Use will fall within the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent French courts.
    2. If any provision of these Terms of Use is found to be invalid by any court having competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of these Terms of Use, which shall remain in full force and effect.
    3. NETATMO not applying any provisions of these Terms of Use is not construing as a waiver of that provision or any other provision in these Terms of Use.
    4. Except as expressly agreed by NETATMO and you, these Terms of Use constitutes the entire Terms of Use between you and NETATMO with respect to the subject matter, and supersedes all previous agreements, whether written or oral, between the you and NETATMO with respect to the subject matter.
    5. The section headings are provided merely for convenience and shall not be given any legal import.
    6. These Terms of Use will inure to the benefit of our successors, assigns, licensees, and sublicensees.
    7. Any information submitted or provided by you might be publicly accessible. Important and private information should be protected by you. NETATMO is not liable for protection of privacy of electronic mail or other information transferred through the Internet or any other network that you may use.

The collection and processing of Personal Data, made when you use the Services, is carried out in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to the treatment of personal data and the free movement of such data and repealing Directive 95/46 / EC (the 'General Data Protection Regulation' or GDPR). For more information, please see our Privacy Policy.

PRIVACY POLICY Amended on 02 May 2018 - Updated on 04 March 2021, to improve the understanding of our users

Your privacy and the protection of your Personal Data is very important to us at NETATMO ("NETATMO", "We", "Us" or "Our"). Accordingly, we have drafted the present Privacy Policy to explain Our policy with respect to data identifying or allowing to identify, directly or indirectly, a person using one or several specific elements ("Personal Data") including the measurements collected by Our connected solutions (the "Measurements"). Such Personal Data are either generated or collected by NETATMO or directly communicated by you when using any of the NETATMO products (the "Product" or "Products"), Our Websites and more generally all URLs administered by NETATMO and its services (the "Website Services"), and Our software (the "Software", the "Computer Software" and "Mobile Software"). As used herein, the term "Services" means the Website, Website Services, Computer Software and Mobile Software.
The present Privacy Policy apply to any Personal Data processed by NETATMO through its Websites, Services and connected Products. If you use Home + Control Mobile Software, please refer to the Privacy Notice attached to this Mobile Software.

    COMPLIANCE WITH DATA PROTECTION LEGISLATION

    The collection and processing of Personal Data, done when you use the Services provided by NETATMO, are carried out in accordance with Data Protection Legislation, inter alia, Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council ("General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679" or "GDPR"), the Russian Federation Federal Law No.152 “On personal data defense” dd. July 27,2006 as well as any other European or domestic regulations applicable in this field that may be added to or subsequently replaced by it (mentioned hereinafter as "Data Protection Legislation").

    IDENTITY OF THE DATA CONTROLLER

    When using the Services, all processing of Personal Data is carried out by NETATMO acting as a Data Controller:
    NETATMO
    73 Rue de Sèvres
    92100 Boulogne-Billancourt,
    France

    ACCOUNT CREATION

    To benefit from Our Services (make a purchase on Our E-shop, use Our Mobile or Web Applications, contact Our Customer Service or get certified as a professional installer), you need to register by creating your personal account.
    When doing so through Our Website or Our Mobile Software, you will be required to communicate an e-mail address and a password (hashed). Please note that both data are mandatory and essential for providing the Services that you requested. Failure to fill in a mandatory field will result in preventing the creation of your user account.

    1. On the basis of the contract, We will process such data in order to create and manage your personal client account.
    2. We may also process your e-mail address for communications and direct marketing purposes. For more information on this processing activity, please consult the COMMUNICATIONS AND DIRECT MARKETING ACTIVITIES section.

    The data collected to create your account will be kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com). We also inform you that, unless opposed by you, your account will be deleted if it remains inactive for 3 years. For Home + Control Mobile Software users, this deletion will also delete the data associated to this Mobile Software.
    Note that you can review and edit your personal data and other information on Our Website and on Our Mobile applications.
    For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    CONTACTING OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE

    1. When contacting Our Helpdesk Support, We will collect the reason for contact and your message. Note that both data are mandatory and essential for providing the Services that you requested. Failure to fill in one of those field will compromise the proper handling of your request. Also note that you may attach and send Us a file to support your query. On the basis of the contract, We will process such data for the exclusive purposes of directing your request to the relevant internal department and giving an answer to your query.
    2. On the legal basis of the contract, we may where applicable and subject to your prior authorization, access your installation data (user account and associated Products data) for after-sales services purposes in order to diagnose and resolve a potential issue.
    3. On the basis of Our legitimate interest in improving Our client relations, we inform you that we will retain your Helpdesk customer history.

    The data collected by Our Customer Service is kept for a maximum of 6 years.
    For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    WEBSITE
    • Navigating On Our Website And Using Our Web-Applications

      • Cookies and Similar Technologies

      When you browse the NETATMO Website, Cookies are placed on your browser. A cookie is a piece of information that the computer program which hosts Our Website gives to your browser when you access the Website. The cookies help provide additional functionality to the Website and help Us analyze Site usage more accurately. In some cases, you will be asked to provide prior consent before we use certain types of cookies. We recommend that you leave the cookies turned on or activated because they allow you to take advantage of some of the features on the Website.

      Necessary

      These cookies are strictly necessary to the functioning of the Website and/or allow the provision of a service requested by the visitor: protection against bot attacks to ensure the good behavior of the Website, remember the language version that you chose, remember the last app opened etc. Such cookies may collect the following categories of data: IP address, Session ID, information about the user’s device, activities performed on the Website, and are processed on the contract basis.

      • na_session

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: handle the images cache so that the whole website doesn’t have to reload each time
          Type: Technical Cookies
          Lifespan: 2 hours

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: NETATMO

      • netatmocomaccess_token

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: login token
          Type: Technical Cookies
          Lifespan: 3 hours

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: NETATMO

      • netatmocomci_csrf_cookie_na

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: authenticate each visitor and session with a random token and defend against bots’ attacks
          Type: Technical Cookies
          Lifespan: 12 hours

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: NETATMO

      • netatmocomlast_app_used

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: keep the last app opened by the visitor on his my.netatmo.com (security, energy etc)

      • netatmocomlocale

          Type: Technical Cookies

      • XSRF-TOKEN

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: authenticate each visitor and session with a random token and defend against bots attacks
          Type: Technical Cookies

      • gtm_cookie_consent_optout

      Analytics and personalization

      These cookies allow Us to obtain non-nominative statistics about Our Website to help Us optimize its ergonomics, content and navigation.
      Through the use of such cookies, NETATMO can only access the following categories of data: IP address, unique ID of cookie, information about the user’s device and activities performed on the Website (first and last visit, length of visit, time of arrival and departure etc.).
      If you consent to the deposit of such cookies, you can reconsider your decision and refuse the statistical analysis of your navigation data at any time by withdrawing your consent directly within the table.

      • _ga

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.
          Type: Audience Measurement Cookies
          Lifespan: 13 months

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: GOOGLE ANALYTICS

      • _gat

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Used to throttle requests to google analytics, limiting the collection of data on high traffic. It expires after the session ends.
          Type: Audience Measurement Cookies
          Lifespan: 1 minute

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: GOOGLE ANALYTICS

      • _gid

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.
          Type: Audience Measurement Cookies
          Lifespan: 24 hours

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: GOOGLE ANALYTICS

      • ABTasty

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Registers the testing data: visitorID, tests ID, timestamps.
          Type: Advertisement Cookies
          Lifespan: 13 months

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: ABTASTY

      • ABTastySession

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Identify a unique session for a visitor
          Type: Advertisement Cookies
          Lifespan: 30 minutes

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: ABTASTY

      Commercial Partners

      The advertisement cookies allow NETATMO or its partners to advertise to you the most relevant and the most adapted advertisements, according to your interests and navigation on the site.
      Through the use of such cookies, NETATMO can only access the following categories of personal data: IP address, unique ID of cookie, information about the user’s device and navigation data.
      If you consent to the deposit of such cookies, you can reconsider your decision and withdraw it later at any time directly within the table. By opposing to the use of this set of cookies, you will no longer be able to view personalized advertisement and may have advertisement that is not related to your supposed interests.

      • _fbp

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers.
          Type: Advertisement Cookies
          Lifespan: 2 months

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: FACEBOOK

      • cto_lwid

        • COOKIE DESCRIPTION: Used by Google to collect non-nominative information for use on Google Adwords. The data helps Google deliver relevant advertising on other websites.
          Type: Advertisement Cookies
          Lifespan: 13 months

        • COOKIE GENERATOR: GOOGLE DOUBLECLICK.NET

      Socials

      These features use third-party cookies directly deposited by these services. NETATMO does not collect any data through social plugins cookies.
      If you consent to the deposit of such cookies, you can reconsider your decision and withdraw it later at any time directly within the table. Please note that in this case you will no longer be able to rely on such Third-Party services. For example, you will not be able to access Social Media to share a post or comments about the Products.

      Accept

      Third party cookies aimed at improving the interactivity of the Website

      The social plugins cookies allow you to interact with the following Social Media platforms:

      2. Twitter. For more information on Twitter's policy concerning personal data protection, please refer to: https://twitter.com/privacy
      3. LinkedIn. For more information on LinkedIn’s policy concerning personal data protection, please refer to: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy.
      4. Youtube. You will find a list and an overview of YouTube social plugins at the following address: https://www.youtube.com/yt/dev/. For more information on YouTube’s policy with regard to personal data protection, please refer to: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/2801895

      Audience Measurement Cookies

      These cookies allow Us to obtain non-nominative statistics about Our Website to help Us optimize its ergonomics, content and navigation.
      Through the use of such cookies, NETATMO can only access the following categories of data: IP address, unique ID of cookie, information about the user’s device and activities performed on the Website (first and last visit, length of visit, time of arrival and departure etc.).
      If you consent to the deposit of such cookies, you can reconsider your decision and refuse the statistical analysis of your navigation data at any time by withdrawing your consent directly within the table.

      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section below.

      DISCLAIMER - LINKS TO OTHER WEB SITES

      The present Privacy Policy does not apply to Third-Party Websites. Although Our Websites may contain links to other websites, this does not imply that NETATMO endorses or has reviewed such Third-Party Websites that are not operated nor controlled by NETATMO. Please refer to the Third-Party Websites’ privacy policies to obtain information as to how they process your Personal Data.

    • Making A Purchase On Our E-shop

      • To allow fulfilment of the orders that you have placed on Our e-shop, you will be asked to complete your store account by providing your name and surname, title (Mr. or Mrs.), e-mail address, delivery address, billing address and phone number. Note that such data are compulsory. Failure to answer a mandatory field will result in compromising the proper fulfilment of your purchase order. You may also decide to communicate you birth date.

      1. On the basis of the contract, We will process all compulsory data in order to create and manage your store account and to manage your order and its delivery.
      2. Should you provide Us with this information, we will process your birth date for birthday offer proposition management purposes on the basis of Our legitimate interest in direct marketing, For more information on this processing activity, please consult the COMMUNICATIONS AND DIRECT MARKETING ACTIVITIES section below.
      3. We inform you that, on the basis of the contract, We will also retain your Purchase history and make it accessible to you on your account. We may also process such data for analytical profiling purposes. For more information on analytical profiling please refer to the Analytical Profiling for Direct Marketing Purposes section below.

      The data relating to the online store account are kept for the duration of the customer relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com).
      Billing receipts will be kept for 10 years from the end of the financial year in accordance with the applicable legal retention period.
      Your credit card and other financial account information are solely processed by Our service provider, STRIPE in compliance with Our contractual provisions and the applicable legislation. NETATMO does not collect or otherwise process any financial information during the purchase operation.
      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    COMMUNICATIONS AND DIRECT MARKETING ACTIVITIES
    • Direct Marketing by E-mail

      • We may use your e-mail address to send you some product information, birthday offer propositions (if you decided to provide Us with this information), quizzes and commercial offer propositions.
      Subject to your explicit consent, your e-mail address will be processed for the purpose of sending you offers, news bulletins, new products and promotional campaigns related to LEGRAND, NETATMO and BTICINO products and/or services by e-mail.
      Note that you can always oppose to this processing and unsubscribe from Our communications at any time by clicking the link at the bottom of Our e-mails or by following the procedure set out in the EXERCISE OF USERS' RIGHTS section.
      Your e-mail address will be kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com). We also inform you that, unless opposed by you, your account will be deleted if it remains inactive for 3 years.We inform you that We will process openings and clicks in order to assess the efficiency of Our campaigns on the basis of Our legitimate interest in improving Our communications.
      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    • In-App Communications and Push Notifications
      • In-App Communications

        • NETATMO can send commercial and/or operational communications directly to your Mobile Application. To do so, the language that you have set on your device will be collected to adapt the language of Our communications. We also inform you that, subject to your explicit consent, NETATMO will collect and process audience measurement data through the analytics tools installed on Its mobile applications in order to assess the efficiency of its commercial campaigns. To learn more about this analytics processing, please refer to the Cookies and Similar Technologies used on Our Mobile Applications section.
        For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

      • Push Notifications

        • Your Mobile Application may send you push notifications or alerts (For example, your Weather Station sends an alert to your device when a remarkable event occurs for the temperature, humidity, pressure or weather alerts). Note that you can disable and/or manage such notifications at any time directly from your account.

    • Analytical Profiling for Direct Marketing Purposes (through e-mail and in-app communications)

      • NETATMO aims at enhancing Its customer experience by sending the most relevant communications to Its clients. If you consented to receiving Our communications, We inform you that We conduct research on customer interests and perform some analytical profiling activities for personalized direct marketing purposes on the basis of the products that you use (Products paired to your App) and/or bought (Purchase history). Such processing activity is performed on the basis of Our legitimate interest in continuously improving Our communications and clients’ relations. Note that if you do not wish to receive tailored communications, you can oppose to this analytical profiling activity at any time by following the procedure set out in the EXERCISE OF USERS' RIGHTS section.
      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    • Surveys, Quizzes and Contests
      • Surveys and Quizzes

        • From time to time, NETATMO may send surveys to its clients and collect their answers on the basis of Its legitimate interest in improving its Products, Services and clients’ relations. Whether such surveys are sent via e-mails or in-app communications, We inform you that We may rely on third-party service providers acting as Data Processors to perform this processing activity. Such data recipient will only process your personal data for the exclusive purpose of compiling and managing the answers to Our surveys in accordance with Our contractual provisions and the applicable legislation.
        Survey data are processed on a non-nominative basis and are kept for 2 years.
        For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

      • Contests

        • From time to time, NETATMO may organize contests on Its Website. To participate, you will be required to fill a form and to accept the contests terms and conditions. This processing activity will therefore be performed on the contract basis. Note that We are relying on third-party service providers acting as Data Processors to perform this processing activity. We inform you that such data recipient will only process your personal data for the exclusive purpose of managing the contest and selecting a winner in accordance with Our contractual provisions and the applicable legislation.
        Contests data are kept for 2 years.
        For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    MOBILE APPLICATIONS AND ASSOCIATED PRODUCTS
    • Processing Activities Common To All Our Mobile Applications
      • Cookies And Similar Technologies Used On Our Mobile Applications

        • Third-Party Services required for the proper functioning of the Mobile Application

        The iOS and Android applications use the Crashlytics tool (Google) in order to record crashes that may occur during the use of the application.
        Only real-time crash reports are sent with precise indications of code positions and device information. these reports are intended to simplify maintenance and thus improve the stability of the application.
        We inform you that NETATMO accesses and processes the following Personal Data: unique ID of cookie, IP address, information about the equipment (making, brand and unique ID of equipment, physical location of the device at the time of crash etc.). Crash data is kept for up to 90 days.
        To learn more about how Google processes the personal data collected through Crashlytics, please visit: https://docs.fabric.io/android/fabric/data-privacy.html

        Third-party services for audience measurement purposes on the Mobile Application

        We use Firebase (Google) for the collection of statistical data that allows Us to know the interactions of the users on Our mobile applications and to understand how users use Our products and services. To learn more about Google's processing of your personal data through Firebase, please visit https://docs.fabric.io/apple/fabric/data-privacy.html.
        We inform you that NETATMO accesses and processes the following Personal Data: unique identifier of the cookie, IP address, information on the material and the activities carried out (dates of the first and last visit of the user / duration of the visit / hours of arrival and departure etc.). The retention period of such data is 90 days.
        If you consent to the reading of Answers, you can reconsider your decision and refuse the statistical analysis of your navigation data at any time and withdraw your consent by managing your settings directly within your Application.

        Advertisement

        An advertising identifier (E.G. 'ad-ID' or 'IDFA') is a user specific mobile identifier assigned by your device or operating environment. Note that We will process such data to evaluate and tailor advertising campaigns. Your advertising ID can also be accessed and further processed by your mobile manufacturer unless you refuse it in the parameter of your mobile device.
        For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

      • Third-Party Applications

        • To subscribe to third-party services, you must accept the specific terms of use and/or privacy policies that apply to such services. We will collect the third-party authorizations that you gave and process this data to manage access authorizations in accordance with your choices. The decision to subscribe to these third-party services or otherwise is yours alone. Note that you can revoke the authorizations that you gave directly from your mobile application.
        You acknowledge that the possibility of subscribing to these third-party services is provided to you as a service by NETATMO, but that We have no means of controlling these third-party services. NETATMO therefore formally refuses to accept any liability for these third-party services.

      • Uninstalling Our Mobile Applications

        • Uninstalling Our Mobile Applications does not erase your data. If you wish to have your data deleted immediately, please make a deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com. However, note that unless opposed by you, We will delete your account and all associated Product data after three years of inactivity.

    • WEATHER Mobile Application

      • The WEATHER Mobile Application allows you to pair the NETATMO’s Weather station and its accessories (outdoor module / indoor module / wind gauge / rain gauge).
      This particular Service entails the processing of Personal Data under the following modalities:

      1. Your Weather station location (GPS) will be processed on the contract basis for Product registration, Identification of available WIFI networks and display of more precise information purposes.
        Subject to your explicit consent, collected at the time of registration, this data will also be used to place you on the NETATMO’s WeatherMap. .
        The location of your Weather Station will be retained until you change its location: should you move your Weather Station after installation, you can geolocate it again at any time in order to obtain more relevant information and proper placement on the WeatherMap. On this occasion, a system pop-up will ask for your explicit consent. In the alternative, you can decide to enter a new address manually.
        Note that contribution to the NETATMO WeatherMap is disabled by default. By choosing to contribute to the NETATMO WeatherMap, only your outdoor data will be shared. The indoor data will remain private. If you do not wish to contribute, we will not share any information of yours whatsoever, only you will see your Station on the map. Should you consent to contributing, We inform you that you can withdraw your consent from the Weather Station’s settings menu at any time (Settings >. Station name >. Advanced).
      2. The language of your device, your city and country (inferred from your IP address) will be processed on the contract basis for adapting the language used on your Application and to adapt zone information.
      3. We will also collect measurement data relative to each product (temperature, wind, rain, altitude inferred from localization of Product, pressure, sound level, humidity, Co2) on the contract basis and communicate it to you on your Application to render the Service. On the basis of Our legitimate interest in improving Our Products and Services, We will also process measurement data for R&D analysis in order to improve the content and functionality of Our Products and Services. If consented, the external measurement data could be shared with third party partners to improve the weather forecast or make statistical studies for a given time
      4. The Product and Home name(s) will be processed on the contract basis in order to personalize your user’s interface.
      5. The Date and time of setup of each Product and the Last time and date of seen for each Product will be processed on the contract basis for Helpdesk support purposes and to delete inactive user accounts.
      6. The following technical data: MAC addresses of each Product, Network IP address, Network Transport, WIFI status, Mobile IP address, Mobile type and Mobile version will be processed on the contract basis for Product registration, Usage of the solution and distribution of Weather Feed alerts purposes.

      Except for the location of your Weather Station, as well as the measurement data related to each product (temperature, wind, rain, altitude deduced from the location of the Product, pressure, sound level, humidity, CO2), which are kept for 10 years by our partners from their date of collection for research and statistical analysis purposes, all the above data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com). We also inform you that, unless opposed by you, your account and all associated Products data will be deleted after 3 years of inactivity. In the alternative, note that you can reset the Product which will result in deleting your Product data.
      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    • ENERGY Mobile Application

      • The ENERGY Mobile Application allows you to pair the NETATMO’s Smart Thermostat and its accessories (Smart Radiator Valves).
      This particular Service entails the processing of Personal Data under the following modalities:

      1. The Product Location (GPS) will be processed on the contract basis for product registration, identification of available WIFI networks and obtention of external temperature purposes.
      2. The language of your device, your city and country (inferred from your IP address) will be processed on the contract basis for adapting the language used on your Application.
      3. We will also collect measurement data relative to each product (temperature) on the contract basis and communicate it to you on your Application to render the Service. On the basis of Our legitimate interest in improving Our Products and Services, We will also process measurement data for R&D analysis in order to improve the content and functionality of Our Products and Services.
      4. Heating schedule (per user and per device) will be collected and processed on the contract basis and communicated to you on your Application. This data also serves the purpose of operating the solution.
      5. Should you provide Us with the following data: Energy sources, type of house, surface of house m², We will process it on the contract basis in order to give you more precise and personalized information.
      6. The Product and Home name(s), room name and type will be processed on the contract basis in order to personalize your interface.
      7. The Date and time of setup of each Product and the Last time and date of seen for each Product will be processed on the contract basis for Helpdesk support purposes and to delete inactive user accounts.
      8. The following technical data: MAC addresses of each Product, Network IP address, Network Transport, WIFI status, Mobile IP address, Mobile type and Mobile version will be processed on the contract basis for product registration, execution of the Service and maintenance of Thermostat and associated accessories.

      The above data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com). We also inform you that, unless opposed by you, your account and all associated Products data will be deleted after 3 years of inactivity.
      In the alternative, note that you can reset the Product which will result in deleting your Product data.
      To learn more about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.
