    • SECURITY Mobile Application

      • The SECURITY Mobile Application allows you to pair the NETATMO’s Smart Indoor Camera, Smart Outdoor Camera, Smart Video Doorbell, Smart Door &. Window Sensors, Smart Smoke Alarm and Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm.
      In all the articles, the term "Camera" applies to the Smart Indoor Camera, the Smart Outdoor Camera and the Smart Video Doorbell
      Using Our Security Cameras entails the processing of Personal Data under the following modalities:

      1. The Security Cameras and accessories GPS location (Smart Door &. Window Sensors) will be processed on the contract basis for product registration and identification of available WIFI networks purposes.
      2. The type and number of Security accessories linked to the Camera (Tags – Siren - Smart Door &. Window Sensors) will be processed on the contract basis for product registration and rendering of the Service purposes.
      3. The location of your Mobile device will be processed, subject to your explicit consent, for geofencing purposes in order to determine when you leave your home, in the background (even when the app is closed or not in use).
      4. The language of your device, your city and country (inferred from your IP address) will be processed on the contract basis for adapting the language used on your Application.
      5. The Security Cameras and accessories name, Home and room names will be processed on the contract basis in order to personalize your user’s interface.
      6. The Metrics used for the Products (Event logs, home occupancy) will be processed on the contract basis in order to personalize the Service to your needs.
      7. We will also collect measurement data relative to each product (Events from Cameras, Tags, Sirens, Smart Door &. Window Sensors, end user reports) on the contract basis and communicate it to you on your Application to render the Service.
      8. The Date and time of setup of each Product and the Last time and date of seen for each Product will be processed on the contract basis for Helpdesk support purposes and to delete inactive user accounts.
      9. The following technical data: MAC addresses of each Product, Network IP address, Network Transport, WIFI status, Mobile IP address, Mobile type and Mobile version will be processed on the contract basis for product registration, execution of the Service and maintenance of the Cameras and associated accessories.

      The above data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com). We also inform you that, unless opposed by you, your account and associated Products data will be deleted after 3 years of inactivity.
      In the alternative, note that you can reset the Security Cameras or accessories which will result in deleting your Product data.
      You can delete also the events at any time from the parameter in the settings (a week. month or year). Such events will be deleted from the backend after you delete them from the SD card of your Product.

      SECURITY CAMERAS SPECIFIC - ACCESS TO DATA

      Shall you voluntarily send Us a video taken by your Security Camera when contacting Our Customer Support to report an issue, We may ask for your consent to process such data to improve Our algorithms and the performance of Our Security Cameras.
      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

      PROCESSING OF SPECIAL CATEGORIES OF PERSONAL DATA AND USERS’ RESPONSIBILITIES

      We inform you that Our Indoor Cameras allow the processing of biometric data for the purpose of uniquely identifying a natural person. This feature is enabled by default. You can disable the processing of biometric data at any time by managing your settings directly from the Security Application.
      The data allowing this processing activity are hosted locally on the SD card of your Product (profile that you have created, answers that you gave when using the algorithm). NETATMO only hosts the events that you have defined until you delete them or for the time-period that you have set at the latest. NETATMO will not process such data for the purpose of identifying a natural person.
      Our Security Cameras have been developed for a strictly personal or domestic use and / or activity.
      They allow you to determine the purposes and means of the processing activities you want to achieve. As such, you are required to comply with all applicable legislation regarding the protection of personal data, image rights and privacy.
      Should you decide to use Our Security Cameras for a different use, you will be considered as the sole Data Controller, NETATMO remains a Data Processor.
      In any case, you are responsible for compliance with any applicable law when using Our Product and Services and you must inform your visitors about the functioning and operation of the Security Cameras. If necessary, depending on your processing activities, you may need to obtain their prior explicit consent.
      Using Our Smart Smoke Alarm / Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm entails the processing of Personal Data under the following modalities:

      1. The Smart Smoke Alarm / Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm location (GPS) will be processed on the contract basis for product registration and identification of available WIFI networks purposes.
      2. The language of your device, your city and country (inferred from your IP address) will be processed on the contract basis for adapting the language used on your Application.
      3. The Smart Smoke Alarm / Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm name, Home and room names will be processed on the contract basis in order to personalize your user’s interface.
      4. We will also collect measurement data relative to each product (Smart Smoke Alarm / Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm status, last detected time, start time, end time, tamper status, date of last sound test) on the contract basis and communicate it to you on your Application to render the Service. On the basis of Our legitimate interest in improving Our Products and Services, We will also process measurement data for R&D analysis in order to improve the content and functionality of Our Products and Services.
      5. The Date and time of setup of each Product and the Last time and date of seen for each Product will be processed on the contract basis for Helpdesk support purposes and to delete inactive user accounts.
      6. The following technical data: MAC addresses of each Product, Network IP address, Network Transport, WIFI status, Mobile IP address, Mobile type and Mobile version will be processed on the contract basis for product registration, execution of the Service and maintenance of the Smart Smoke Alarm / Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm.

      The above data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to privacy@netatmo.com). We also inform you that, unless opposed by you, your account and associated Products data will be deleted after 3 years of inactivity.
      In the alternative, note that you can reset the Smart Smoke Alarm / Smart Carbon Monoxide Alarm which will result in deleting your Product data.
      For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.

    NETATMO PRO

    To get certified as a NETATMO PRO, you need to register through Our Website in order to take Our online training tests.
    When doing so, you will be required to communicate an e-mail address, name and surname. Please note that such data are mandatory and essential for registering as a NETATMO PRO. Failure to fill in a mandatory field will result in preventing the creation of your PRO account.

    1. On the basis of the contract, We will process such data in order to create and manage your NETATMO PRO account.
    2. On the basis of Our legitimate interest in improving Our clients’ relations, We will process such data in order to create of your personal file on Our CRM tool provided by Mailchimp.
    3. We may also process your e-mail address for communications and direct marketing purposes. For more information on this processing activity, please consult the COMMUNICATIONS AND DIRECT MARKETING ACTIVITIES section above.
    4. During the use of Our Services, We will collect your Test results (per product) on the basis of the contract and process such data for the purpose of giving you your professional certification.

    The above data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship (that ends by sending a voluntary deletion request to contact-pro@netatmo.com).
    For more information about the data recipients that benefit from an access to your personal data, please consult the ACCESS TO DATA section.
    You can exercise your rights by contacting: contact-pro@netatmo.com. For more information about your rights under data protection legislation, please refer to the EXERCISE OF USERS' RIGHTS section.

    PROFESSIONALS’ OBLIGATIONS

    As a NETATMO PRO (certified professional), you are obliged to inform directly the end-users to read the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy available on the website, at the time of NETATMO Product installation.

    ACCESS TO DATA

    We consider the privacy of your Personal Data to be a vital part of Our relationship with you. We hereby inform you that according to the Services that you are using, the following Data recipients have access to your personal data, within the limits of their respective assignments:

    1. The relevant internal departments of NETATMO, established in France:
      1. The Research and Development (R&D) teams in charge of our intelligent solutions have, in order to achieve their missions, access: to customer account data (email address only) (see section ACCOUNT CREATION), the information collected by the technical cookies necessary for the proper functioning of the Services (see sections Browsing Our Website And Using Our Internet Applications and Cookies And Similar Technologies Used On Our Mobile Applications ), data processed in connection with the use of the Products (see sections WEATHER Mobile Application, ENERGY Mobile Application, AIR CARE Mobile Application, SECURITY Mobile Application except for biometric data that remains locally on the Product)
      2. The teams of our customer support have, for the purpose of achieving their mission, access: to customer account data (see section ACCOUNT CREATION), data collected during your contacts with Technical Support (see section CONTACTING OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE), the data collected as part of the purchase on the Online Store (see section Making A Purchase On Our E-shop), Account Data for NETATMO PRO (refer to section NETATMO PRO), to the data processed in connection with the use of the Products(see sections WEATHER Mobile Application, ENERGY Mobile Application, AIR CARE Mobile Application, SECURITY Mobile Application except for biometric data that remains locally on the Product)
      3. Our marketing teams have, for the purpose of achieving their mission, access to: customer account data (email address) (see section ACCOUNT CREATION), information collected by advertising cookies and measures (see section Browsing Our Website And Using Our Internet Applications), the history of your purchases (see section Making A Purchase On Our E-shop), other possible data while purchasing online (eg anniversary date see Direct Marketing by E-mail), data collected as part of analytic profiling (refer to section In-App Communications and Push Notifications), data collected by our advertising identifiers (see section Cookies and Similar Technologies Used On Our Mobile Applications)
      4. Our online sales teams have access, for the purpose of carrying out their missions, to data transmitted by third-party cookies aimed at improving navigation, functionalities and user experience of the Website (consult section Browsing Our Website And Using Our Internet Applications)
      5. Our sales administration teams have access, for the purpose of carrying out their missions, to the data collected during online purchases (see section Making A Purchase On Our E-shop)
      6. Our sales teams have access to NETATMO PRO account data for the purposes of carrying out their assignments (see section NETATMO PRO)

    2. The service provider MICROSOFT AZURE, whose data centers are located in the Netherlands, responsible for hosting the NETATMO’s cloud architecture hosting all the data related to the Products and associated Services;
    3. The service provider CROC, whose data centers are located in Russia, responsible for hosting Russian user emails to be compliant with Russian Regulation;
    4. The service provider ONLINE, established in France, responsible for hosting historical product data.
    5. The service provider OVH, established in France, responsible for hosting NETATMO’s backups.
    6. The service provider Mailchimp, established in the United States of America, hosting the data related to NETATMO PRO accounts. We also inform you that Mailchimp benefits from a “Privacy Shield” certificate and that any transfer of your data towards the United States of America will take place under security and privacy conditions which are considered adequate according to European legislation.
    7. When making a purchase on Our E-shop, the service provider STRIPE, established in Ireland, is in charge of payment execution.
    8. AMAZON WEB SERVICE, established in Ireland, and in charge of hosting web applications;
    9. The service provider ADOBE SYSTEMS SOFTWARE IRELAND LIMITED, established in Ireland, for the purpose of sending you direct marketing communications where applicable.;
    10. The service provider ZENDESK, whose data centers are located in Germany, for Customer Support Service purposes. We also inform you that Zendesk benefits from a “Privacy Shield” certificate and that We have put the Standard Contractual Clauses of the European Commission in place to organize the transfer of your data towards the United States of America under security and privacy conditions which are considered adequate according to European legislation.
    11. The platforms and social media: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn and YouTube insofar as they have access to your browsing history on Our Website and Mobile Applications should you consent to such access. We also inform you that such platforms and social media benefit from a “Privacy Shield” certificate and as such, any potential transfer of your data for hosting and further processing purposes in the United States of America will take place under security and privacy conditions which are considered adequate according to European legislation. To learn more, please consult Our Cookies and Similar Technologies Used On Our Mobile Applications sections.
      Subject to your express consent, you may also decide to share your Personal Data or Measurements on other platforms such as social networking websites for example. In this case, you recognize that We do not own and have no control over these Third-party Partner Service Providers and that We are not responsible for data processing performed by these Third-party Service Providers. To learn more about the manner in which these Third-party Partner Service Providers process your Personal Data, We advise you to consult their applicable privacy policies.
    12. GOOGLE insofar as they have access to data relating to your browsing history when you confirm your agreement upon arrival on Our Website and Mobile Applications. We inform you that Google benefits from a “Privacy Shield” certificate and as such, any potential transfer of your data for hosting purposes in the United States will take place under security and privacy conditions which are considered adequate according to European legislation. For further information, please consult Our Cookies and Similar Technologies used on Our Mobile Applications sections.

    We inform you that the aforementioned Data Recipients are bound by an obligation of confidentiality and may only process your data in compliance with Our contractual provisions and the applicable legislation.
    1. You may decide to make your Personal Data or Measurements publicly available to other users and third parties on the Website.
    2. You may also decide to invite other user(s) to control the Products that have been installed in your Home. To do so, your guests will be required to create their own personal account. For more information on such invitations, please consult Our Help center on Our Website.
    3. NETATMO may also be required to share your Personal Data if and when it is necessary in order to protect the vital interests of the data subject or of another natural person, if it is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which It is subject or for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims.

    Data Analysis: NETATMO can conduct Data Analysis on the Measurements collected by Its Products. Such data will be rendered anonymous before any further use. NETATMO may then share this anonymized data with advertisers, researchers, business partners, publications, and other third parties for the purpose of performing statistics studies.

    DATA SECURITY

    NETATMO implements adequate physical, electronic and administrative protection measures that comply with the regulations to protect your Personal Data in particular from accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure of, or access to personal data transmitted, stored or otherwise processed.
    However, NETATMO would like to draw the users' attention to the potential risks in terms of data confidentiality linked to Internet use. It is the responsibility of the user to set up or ensure the use of a personal secured computer network, as well as to ensure a correct technical configuration of the connection box connected to your Internet service provider and of other devices such as radio access equipment (e.g. WIFI, 4G, etc.). Therefore, you should take special care in deciding what information you send to Us via e-mail and/or Internet transmission. Please keep this in mind when disclosing any Personal Data through the Website.

    UNDER EIGHTEEN

    When offering information society services NETATMO does not target minors under the age of 18 as a user group.
    NETATMO does not knowingly gather or use any personal information from children under 18. If information is gathered concerning a minor, the minor’s legal representative has the possibility to contact the DPO of NETATMO at privacy@netatmo.com in order to access, rectify, modify or delete this information (see section EXERCISE OF USERS' RIGHTS for more information).
    However, access to the Services is not confined solely to adults as it contains no content prohibited for persons under the age of 18. The Services does not intentionally collect or use personal information relating to persons under the age of 18

    EXERCISE OF USERS' RIGHTS

    To keep your Personal Data accurate, current, and complete, please visit the My Account section of the Site. You may also contact Us as specified below.
    We remind you that you have a right to access, rectify or delete your personal data. You can request that their processing be restricted or object to them being processed. When We rely on your consent to perform a particular processing, you can withdraw such consent at any time.
    If you request the erasure, or object to the processing of data necessary to the performance of Our Services and/or specified as mandatory, you will no longer be able to use the Services, as they require the processing of these data to operate.
    When a processing is carried out by automated means and based either on consent or on contract, you have the right to request the personal data that you provided to Us in an easily accessible format (portability right).
    You may exercise your rights at any time, subject to the production of valid supporting documents, by sending your request to NETATMO’s Data Protection Officer at privacy@netatmo.com.
    Your request will be processed within one month of receipt. If necessary, this period can be extended by two months, in view of the complexity and the number of requests. In this case, you will be informed of this extension and its reasons within one month of receipt of the request.
    No payment will be required for the exercise of your rights except in case of manifestly unfounded or excessive demand. In this case, NETATMO further reserves the right to not respond to your request.
    You also have the right to define guidelines for the fate of your data after your death.
    In the event you remain dissatisfied with Our response, We remind you that you have the right to lodge a complaint with the French data protection authority, Commission Nationale de l’Informatique et des Libertés (CNIL): https://www.cnil.fr/

    AMENDMENT TO THIS DOCUMENT

    The legislation may change, Our Website and other Services may evolve, We may rely on new service providers. As a result, NETATMO may need to make some changes to this Privacy Policy and reserves the right to update it or modify it at any time.
    This Privacy Policy may be viewed on Our Website at any time.

    ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS

    Your access to and use of the NETATMO Services through the Websites are subject to their Terms of Use, available at https://www.netatmo.com.

    DEFINITIONS

    GDPR: General Data Protection Regulation
    DPO: Data Protection Officer
    Data Subject: an identified or identifiable natural person. In this Privacy Policy: an end user/ customer
    Data Controller: a natural or legal person, public authority, agency or other body which, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data
    Data Processor: a natural or legal person, public authority, agency or other body which processes personal data on behalf of the controller
    Data Recipient: a natural or legal person, public authority, agency or another body, to which the personal data are disclosed, whether a third party or not
    Personal Data: any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person
